external_games.name: Night of Full Moon - Apothecary's Blessing

name: Night of Full Moon: Apothecary's Blessing
summary: “My potion, heals good, kills evil” Little Red Riding Hood has been filled with curiosity for the natural world ever since childhood, and enjoys performing strange experiments. To care for her aging Grandma, she secretly learned how to concoct cheap potions from the crazy apothecary.
